dict.acceptation: 货车；（铁路的）无盖货车；（行李）搬运车；

sent.orig: Water Truck Series: Green Spray Truck, Water Transport Truck and Sprinkling Truck.
sent.trans: 水车系列：绿化喷洒车、运水车和洒水车等。

sent.orig: Main Products: CNHTC tractor cargo truck, tipper trucks, special truck for army, special truck for projects.
sent.trans: 主要经营：中国重汽牵引车、载货车、自卸车、特种车、专用车。

sent.orig: Two Truckee truckers truculently truckling to have truck to truck two trucks of truck.
sent.trans: 有两个卡车司机，笨手笨脚地想用卡车拖动两卡车的货物。

sent.orig: Truck after truck was set ablaze as the fire spread.
sent.trans: 火势蔓延，卡车一辆接一辆地起火了。

sent.orig: The load on this truck is one-third heavier than that on that truck.
sent.trans: 这辆汽车的载货比那辆汽车的载货重三分之一。
